column2: "Na yenyaa hɛn tsir dzidzii mu no
column3: nna yehun dɛ supruw no wɔfrɛ no Malta."

column2: "Na nyimpa a wɔwɔ hɔ no yɛɛ hɛn adɔyɛ kɛse: na ɔnam nsu a ɔrotɔ na awɔw no ntsi
column3: wokuaa gya na wɔgyee hɛn nyina fɛfɛɛfɛw."

column2: "Na Paul boaboaa mbabaaba ano guu gya no do no
column3: ehurutsia fi hyew no mu bae bɛbrabraa ne nsa ho."

column2: "Na asaase no do mba yi hun abowa no dɛ ɔsɛn ne nsa ho no
column3: wɔsesee hɔnho nkorkor dɛ
column4: Ampaara nyimpa yi yɛ owudzifo a oefi po mu enya nkwa dze
column5: naaso awerdzi amma no kwan dɛ ɔtsena ase."

column2: "Na ɔpetsee abowa no kyeen gya mu
column3: naaso hwee annyɛ no."

column2: "Na hɔn dze
column3: hɔn enyi daa kwan dɛ ɔrobɔhonhon
column4: anaa ɔrobɔhwe ase ewu awerɛfir mu; na wɔhwɛe hwɛe na wohun dɛ biribiara annyɛ no no
column5: wɔsesaa hɔn adwen dɛ gyama ɔyɛ onyame bi."

column2: "Na apaamu hɔ ara na supruw no mu otsitsir a ne dzin dze Publius n’asaase wɔ; ɔno na ɔgyee hɛn yɛɛ hɛn hɔho ndaansa hwɛɛ hɛn yie."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ nna Publius n’egya da hɔ yar papu nye akokɔr: ɔno na Paul kɔr ne nkyɛn kɔbɔɔ mpaa
column3: na ɔdze ne nsa too no do saa no yarba."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dɛm no
column3: nkaa no so a wɔyar wɔ supruw no mu no bae

column2: "hɔn so na wɔdze enyidzi pii dzii hɛn
column3: na yerubotu no
column4: wɔdze ndzɛmba a ohia hɛn guu hɛn no mu."

column2: "Na abosoom ebiasa ekyir no
column3: yɛfoow Alɛksandria hɛn bi a oedzi awɔwber wɔ supruw no mu a n’asɛnkyerɛdze nye Ntafo no kɔree."

column2: "Na yedur Sirakuse no
column3: yedzii hɔ ndaansa."

column2: "Na hɔ na yefii kwanee baa Rehegium; na da kor ekyir no
column3: pomu mframa bɔe

column2: "hɔ na yehun enuanom bi a wɔserɛɛ hɛn dɛ yɛntsena hɔn nkyɛn nda esuon; na mbrɛ yɛdze kodur Rome nye no."
"Hɔ na enuanom no
column3: wɔtsee hɛn nka no
column4: twaa kwan tsentsen baa bea bi a wɔfrɛ no Apius Guado
column5: na binom so baa bea a wɔfrɛ no Nsadan Ebiasa a ɔno bɛn Rome; behyiaa hɛn
column7: ɔdaa Nyankopɔn ase na ɔhyɛɛ dzen."

column2: "Na yedur Rome mu no
column3: ɔhamupanyin no dze mpokyerɛfo no maa Annkɔbea Safohen no
column5: ɔmaa no ho kwan dɛ ɔnye sordaanyi a ɔhwɛ no no nkɛtsena mbrɛ ɔpɛ."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ndaansa ekyir no
column3: ɔfrɛfrɛɛ Jewfo etsitsir no boaa ano; na wobehyiae no
column6: mannyɛ biribi enntsia ɔman no anaa hɛn egyanom amambra
column7: naaso woyii me dɛ daduanyi fii Jerusalɛm hyɛɛ Romefo nsa;"

column2: "hɔn na wɔhwehwɛɛ mu no
column3: wɔpɛɛ dɛ wogyaa me
column4: osiandɛ woennhu biribiara ɔfata mo wu."

column2: "Na Jewfo kasae tsiae no
column3: ɔbaa dɛ medze m’asɛm kɛdaan Kaesar: nnyɛ dɛ mowɔ biribi a medze bɔtoa me man bi a."

column2: "Na iyi ntsi na meserɛɛ hom dɛ hom mbohu me na hom akasa akyerɛ me: na osian Israel enyidado ntsi na wɔdze nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn yi ato me yi."
"Na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: Hɛn dze yennyaa wo ho nwoma bi mmfii Judea
column4: eso enuanom no mu biara mmbaa ha mmbɔbɔɔ kasee anaa ɔmmbɛkaa wo ho asɛm bɔn bi."

column2: "Na yɛpɛ dɛ yehu dza edwen fa fɛkuw yi ho
column3: osiandɛ yenyim dɛ wɔkasa tsia no wɔ mbea nyina."

column2: "Na wɔhyɛɛ no da no
column3: piinara baa ne nkyɛn wɔ mbrɛ ɔsoɛe no; hɔn na ɔkyerɛɛ hɔn ase dzii Nyankopɔn ahenman no ho dase
column4: na ofitsi Moses mbra nye nkɔnhyɛfo no do kyerɛɛ hɔn Jesus ho asɛm mu fi anapa kesii ewimbir."

column2: "Na binom gyee dza ɔkae no dzii
column3: na binom so anngye enndzi."

column2: "Na hɔn adwen annsaa wɔ dza ɔreka no ho no
column3: wɔkɔree
column4: na Paul kaa asɛm kor bi dɛ
column5: Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no nam nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia do kaa no yie kyerɛɛ hɛn egyanom dɛ
column7: "Kɔ ɔman yi hɔ na se dɛ
column9: naaso hom renntse ase; Na ɔhwɛ dze hom bɔhwɛ

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔman yi akoma epirim
column3: Na hɔn asowa esiw ɔtse ho
column4: Na woemuamua hɔn enyiwa; Amma wɔaammfa hɔn enyiwa ennhu adze
column5: Na wɔaammfa hɔn asowa anntse asɛm
column6: Na wɔaammfa hɔn akoma anntse ase
column7: Ma wɔaanndan ammba me nkyɛn ma maannsa hɔn yarba."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: hom nhu dɛ wɔasoma Nyankopɔn no nkwagye no akɛma amanamamfo: na hɔn so wɔbɛtse."

column2: "[Na ɔkaa dɛm no
column3: Jewfo no kɔree
column4: na wɔgyegyee ekyingye wɔ hɔn mu.]"
column5: "#28.29 Tsetse akyerɛwfo binom mmfa nkyekyɛmu 29 yi nnka ho."

column2: "Na Paul tsenaa nankasa ne fi a otua kaw mu mfe ebien
column3: na ɔgyee hɔn a wɔbaa ne nkyɛn nyina
column6: na ɔdze ndamyɛ nyina kyerɛkyerɛɛ ndzɛmba a ɔfa Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ho
